translations: 踩，践踏；伤害，侵犯；脚步沉重地走

sentences.sentence: Trample not upon thy beseeching worms, O noble Majesty!
sentences.translation: 高贵的陛下，不要践踏你那哀求的可怜虫！

sentences.sentence: An angry elephant can trample an enemy to death or pick him up with his trunk and smash his hated enemy on the ground.
sentences.translation: 一头愤怒的大象可以把敌人踩死，也可以用鼻子把他提起来，把他讨厌的敌人击倒在地。

sentences.sentence: Their feet will trample on the dead bodies of their perfidious aggressors.
sentences.translation: 他们将从背信弃义的侵略者的尸体上踏过。
